About Us

We are NightLight AI - an idea that sparks with innovation and carries huge potential.

Innovation in the Heart

NightLight isn't replica of an earlier project - it's an entirely different arena. It is where Innovation is the key and Security is the lock. We are a little Innovation that aims to soar high in near future.

Future brings Light

We aim to conquer all Worldy disasters and problems with the help of AI. We have already an AI Powered Voice Assistant that helps us combat Fake News by detecting it in realtime with more than 98.79%^^ accuracy. it is idely available in your web browser as well as the Google Assistant. Check it here

Devoted to Technology

We don't know what will the World look like after 10 or 20 years since now. But we believe in creating something even bigger Today so that, we don't look back at Yesterday comparing it with Tomorrow.

Wait, Meet Ayush Anand !

Hi, I'm Ayush - The founder of NightLight AI. Ayush Anand is an Artificial Intelligence and Web Developer at India. He is still pursuing High School Studies in the Science Stream (Engineering). He works closely with developers across the globe in evangelizing AI portfolio and solutions, getting together to build understand Machine Learning and Deep Learning Models using Frameworks like Brain, Natural, Tensorflow JS, and visualising data for the good of Humanity. He has acquired quite an experience in Front-End Technologies in Web Developent as well as Backend Frameworks like Google Firebase, and has been constantly contnuing with untiring efforsts in the field since the last 3 years. The latest of his innovations include Alec AI Assist, a Voice enabled chatbot that detect and classify fake news with an accuracy of about 98.79% !

Know More About Him

NightLight AI

NightLight AI is an umbrella project by Ayush Anand, a Web and AI Developer. NightLight AI has been created to serve as a main platform to showcase all AI Projects by him. it countniues to work globally in evangelizing AI portfolio and solutions, getting together to build understand Machine Learning and Deep Learning Models and visualising data for the good of Humanity.
